content: lion brand pattern # 60831a skill level easy + romance® old article #440 *discontinued* 480 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 12 sts + 5½ row = 6 in 15 cm in pattern work 21-row pattern finish with edging see half moon shawl #60274ad 1 for a larger romance yarn version search for other lion brand half moon crochet shawl patterns 2 on ravelry 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/half-moon-shawl-60274ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#craft=crochet&query=half%20moon&page=1&website=lionbrand com&sort=name&popcorn=shawl-wrap&view=captioned_thumbs
